<title level="1" right="Action">[Detect Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=513) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 479 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You cast [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) at regular intervals. You move at half your travel speed or slower. You have no chance of accidentally overlooking a magic aura at a travel speed up to 300 feet per minute, but must be traveling no more than 150 feet per minute to detect magic auras before the party moves into them.
name: Detect Magic
